Package com.sun.pdfview.pattern

Class ShaderType3

java.lang.Object
com.sun.pdfview.pattern.PDFShader
com.sun.pdfview.pattern.ShaderType3
public class ShaderType3 extends PDFShader
A shader that performs radial shader based on a function.
